name: Graydle Dreidel Dragon
text:
1 Aqua-Type Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
You can only control 1 face-up "Graydle Dreidel Dragon". This card cannot be targeted by card effects. If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "Graydle" monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 "Graydle" card on your field or in your hand, then destroy 1 card your opponent controls.
